topic: Tulum was the only ancient Maya city built on a beach. But it wasn't for vacation â€” it was a black market trading port for obsidian, jade, and cacao. The Maya basically invented offshore trading 1000 years before Wall Street.
title: Maya Invented Offshore Trading ğŸï¸
narration: Did you know Tulum was the only ancient Maya city on a beach? But it wasn't for sunbathing! This coastal gem was a bustling black market for obsidian, jade, and cacao. The Maya perfected offshore trading centuries before Wall Street even existed!
videoPrompt: Scene 1: Aerial view of Tulum's ruins against the turquoise sea at sunrise. Scene 2: Close-up on ancient Maya merchants trading obsidian, jade, and cacao. Scene 3: Transition to a bustling market scene, showcasing vibrant Maya life. End: Fade to a serene beach sunset. Photorealistic with warm, earthy tones.
